item.title: Communiquette
item.description: A website replacing the communication book of ITS. Teachers Writing daily reports Writing monthly reports Students Homework upload Image Manual writing

item.title: ITS 01
item.description: A web to remember and mark down the history of the first ITS class. Ideas Timeline of every people who left and joined

item.title: Life Goals
item.description: What I want to achieve in my life. Move out of Thailand Options Somehow make enough money myself to move out (Unlikely) Get a job abroad somehow (less likely) Scholarships (more likely) Countries I want go BEAUTIFUL nice trains Netherlands Norway Switzerland Sweden New Zealand (Friendly People) GOOD Australia Singapore Canada (Friendly People) NO OTHER CHOICE USA England China

item.title: Moeyly
item.description: A personal portfolio website for my friend Moey. Todo About me Hobbies Drawing Art Eating Favourite Food & Drinks

item.title: Pat's Time Wheel
item.description: Display the time schedule of my day as a wheel. Maybe create this as a template for others to create.

item.title: Patato.live
item.description: A personal website telling what I do. Basically a portfolio website. Todo Projects Paimonade Digitots CarQueue Timeline of my coding journey Reference scroll to More Links Twitch Discord Garden Languages I speak

item.title: Why I want to move to the Netherlands
item.description: Here's why I want to move to the Netherlands Weather Nice chill weather. That’s all. And I love it. Bikes I love biking.
